content.rendered:
Directed by Cherag Ruparel

Written by Cherag Ruparel

Cast Vardhan Puri (Sahil Mehra / Surya Mehra). Shivaleeka Oberoi (Mitee Deora). Ruslaan Mumtaz (Anuj Mahtur). Satish Kaushik (Chhenu Babu). Jessy Lever (Venugopal (as Jessey Lever)). Amit Arora (Priyank Sharma). Deepansha Dhingra (Kavita). Pulkit Bangia (Jehan). Sanjeev Johri (Dr. Irani). Jaswant Singh (Nanu). Yudhvir Dahiya (Dr. Jha). Athar Nawaaz (Mittee’s Father). Sunita Hooda (Mittee’s Mother). Sahib Singh Narang(Harman). Rahuul Aamath (Javed Siddiqui) . Mukesh Choudhary (Om). Pankaj Kumar (Student). Pankaj Kumar (Student Role Played). Shiva Kumar (Sahil’s caretaker). Hanif Memon (Patel)

Languages Hindi

Producers Akshay Gada. Dhaval Gada. Kushal Gada. Neeraj Gala. Reshmaa Kadakia. Jeetendra Kapoor. Shailendra Kaushik. Mohan Nayyar. Meena Rajeev Puri. Rajeev Amrish Puri. Vardhan Puri. Harshveer Srivastava

Production Amrish Puri Film. Dr. Jayantilal Gada
